lines.text: LETTY H. SIMON
400 EAST 56 STREET  NEW YORK, NEW YORK 10022 ·212 - 758-8041
SOME HELPFUL BACKGROUND INFORMATION
ABOUT LETTY H. SIMON
Success and accomplishment since mid 196o's in the area's of political
organization and strategy. Thorough working knowledge of New York City
bureacracy. Served in administrative positions within the government,
including Assistant Commissioner of a major agency. Firm grasp on current
political environment. Founded a public relations consultancy in order to
continue to grow as a professional. Business founded in mid 197o's.
Current clients include:
Klinghoffer Family: Public relations and media consultant and their spokesperson
during the Achille Lauro tragedy this past fall. For a period of over 3 weeks, the
major media sources & local media sources acknowledged that I handled the flow
of information about the #l news story in the world. Have gained a great degree
of credibility and respect from that industry as a result of my efforts.
Committee for Astor Place, Inc.: Organized the corporate community and local
interests to cause a $2.5 million restoration/improvement of a landmark subway
station. Project in partnership with Metropolitan Transportation Authority and will
be completed in a few short months. Handle area promotion and public relations
for the Committee. Major recent accomplishment: Department of Consumer Affairs
passed administrative ruling prohibiting street vendors in the area - and did so
after their position to deny such a ruling was "re-evealuated" due to the pressures
brought to bear on the situation. Members of this Committee include: Presidents
of The Cooper Union, Tobe Coburn School, Scholastic Inc. Schieffelin & Company,
Astor Wines & Spirits, New York Shakespeare Festival; Mrs. Brooke Astor; Senior
Vice Presidents of American Express and U.S. Trust Company of New York.
